pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, July 2, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, July 2, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Gr√©goire Trudeau will participate in WE Day Canada and will deliver remarks.

Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for media accredited by the Parliamentary Press Gallery and/or those who were accredited for the Canada Day events on the Hill
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.
